snippet: An audit of the Fillmore district’s redevelopment area shows that there was little oversight of spending on the project and little effort to collect loan payments.

byline.original: By MATT SMITH and ZUSHA ELINSON

lead_paragraph: An audit of the Fillmore district’s redevelopment area shows that there was little oversight of spending on the project and little effort to collect loan payments.

headline.seo: Audit of Fillmore District Redevelopment Area Shows Little Oversight in Spending
headline.main: Fillmore District Audit Shows Little Oversight
headline.print_headline: Fillmore District Audit Shows Little Oversight
